title: The Day Shall Come: the ludicrous real FBI plot that inspired the film
text:
They would ride in on the wings of a storm and bring America to its knees. Outside, the skies over Miami were an aching blue and the pavements oppressively hot.

But in the tumbledown house that served as headquarters of the Universal Divine Saviors in the gritty south of the city, Narseal "Naz" Batiste was a million miles away. Eyes wide, voice cracking, he outlined his plan to topple the oppressive United States government, speaking in terms that split the difference between the Book of Revelation and a Michael Bay movie.

He and his fellow believers were to storm Chicago on horseback and cause the city’s tallest towers – including the Sears Tower – to tumble downward, he told his al-Qaeda inside...
description: They would ride in on the wings of a storm and bring America to its knees.
